summary: BuildRequest contains no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff modifies backend/main.mo with substantial new/expanded backend data models and API logic (profiles/referrals/etc.) and updates project_state.json metadata, which appear to add/extend functionality beyond a “clarify requested features” task.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/expanded backend data models and persistent storage for user profiles, products, orders, commissions, payout requests, wallets, referrals, and referral codes, plus new ID counters.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; these are functional changes not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded authorization/permission checks and included authorization mixin/state initialization.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified; BuildRequest focused on clarification and explicitly had no requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded user profile management endpoints (e.g., getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) including referral code uniqueness validation.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified; these are new/changed backend behaviors.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded referral registration flow entrypoint (registerWithReferral) allowing guest/anonymous registration (commented as such).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified; this changes/adds backend behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (projectStateVersion and existing_features listing referencing REQ-1..REQ-7, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest had no requirements and did not ask to update project tracking metadata.
